summary: Taking inspiration from The Human Centipede films, the warden of a notorious and troubled prison looks to create a 500-person human centipede as a solution to his problems.
cast: Dieter Laser|Laurence R. Harvey|Eric Roberts|Robert LaSardo|Tom Lister Jr.|Jay Tavare|Clayton Rohner|Bree Olson|Akihiro Kitamura|Bill Hutchens|Carlos Ramirez|Hamzah Saman|Peter Blankenstein|Jose Julian Molina|Tom Six|Daniel TwoFeathers|Aswad Ali|Dominic Bagarozzi|Julian Bane|Brian Bell|Ben Blenkle|Cristian Burea|Matt Callahan|Frank Cermak Jr.|Chris Clanton|Alex Cojocaru|Craig Cooper|Joshua Corley|James Darnell|Jared Degado|Alon Dina|Rick Dunsford|Beach Eastwood|Michael Flores|Peter Hinz|Jason James|Luke LaGraff|Will Leon|M@tch|Lawrence Moran|Jack Norton|Christian O'Brien|Jonny Ortiz|Jonathan Peacy|Mikey Pobuda|Cliff Redding|Courtney Rice|Urian Ross|Abraham Rubio|Sam Silverstein|Andre Drekno Simmons|Ilona Six|Terry F. title: The human centipede III (Final sequence)
